snippet.title: Spray Paint Simulator - Official Demo Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: See the various steps to prep for a job in this new trailer for Spray Paint Simulator which showcases gameplay from this upcoming painting simulation game. The town of Splatterville is in dire need of a makeover, and they need you to help them! Fill the world with rainbow hues, painting everything from rooms and homes, to cars and bridges, and even giant robots! Spray Paint Simulator will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.
